mapper.select: select stId, stName, stAge, stPhoneNo, stGender, stClass, stHome from student;
select stId, stName, stAge, stPhoneNo, stGender, stClass, stHome from student where stId = #{stId}
mapper.insert: -- insert into student(stName, stAge, stPhoneNo, stGender, stClass, stHome) value stId, stName, stAge, stPhoneNo, stGender, stClass, stHome
